meta_info.name: RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION_ITEM
meta_info.description: Language-specific detail of resource description. When a resource is translated for use in another language environment, each `RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION_ITEM` needs to be copied and translated into the new language.

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: The localised language in which the items in this description item are written. Coded from openEHR code set `languages`.

attributes.name: keywords
attributes.description: Keywords which characterise this resource, used e.g. for indexing and searching.

attributes.name: use
attributes.description: Description of the uses of the resource, i.e. contexts in which it could be used.

attributes.name: misuse
attributes.description: Description of any misuses of the resource, i.e. contexts in which it should not be used.

attributes.name: copyright
attributes.description: Optional copyright statement for the resource as a knowledge resource.

attributes.name: original_resource_uri
attributes.description: URIs of original clinical document(s) or description of which resource is a formalisation, in the language of this description item; keyed by meaning.

attributes.name: other_details
attributes.description: Additional language-senstive resource metadata, as a list of name/value pairs.
